website_summaries.verdict: A terrific dishwasher detergent that is tough on stuck-on messes.
pros: Cleans burnt-on messes in just one wash. Easy to use and no pre-wash needed
Keeps a dishwasher clean and sparkling
Can power away 24-hour stuck-on messes for a complete clean
Includes grease-fighting ingredients that help the dishwasher detergent deliver exceptional results
cons: May cause residue to form on dishes
Detergent odor can build up on dishes over time

customer_reviews.title: Too strong aftertaste and odor.
customer_reviews.text: It cleans the dishes well but it leaves dishes, containers, utensils and all others an extremely strong aftertaste and odor. I had to put everything back in the dishwasher and use a different brand detergent and rewash everything. It seems that the odor builds up after each use and gets stronger. After using a few, I threw them all away.
customer_reviews.author: ATSUKO S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from Amazon. Inferior Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and this product, but the product that came with this particular box was not like the rest. It didn't clean my dishes and left a weird gross residue on them. I threw them out and bought it again from Target and that box worked as expected. Guess I just got a bad box.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - THESE WILL CLOG AND DAMAGE YOUR DISHWASHER
customer_reviews.text: I just paid a $209 bill to have a technician fix my dishwasher after it got error code E24. Water was pooling in the bottom of the dishwasher and would not drain. I did some basic troubleshooting and could not find what was blocking the line. The technician found an undissolved piece of one of these )#(*@*(* pods in the line. I have a VERY expensive dishwasher and these pods clogged the line, resulting in a $200+ bill. DO YOUR RESEARCH ONLINE and you'll see MANY PEOPLE with the same problem. I'll gladly be the lead plaintiff in a class action lawsuit against P&G. These things are GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Two containers of soap and bottle of oil in same package with "air" cushion thrown in. op of oil bottle pushed into soap container and broke the bottom. The product is probably good. I've been buying the soap tabs for years. BTW, what happened to the feedback for packaging?
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch did not dissolve
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these multiple times in the past, and they have been excellent. This time I purchased them and they are not dissolving. I thought it was my dishwasher not working properly and had a repair man come look at it. He charged me to tell me the dishwasher was working properly and it had to be a bad batch of dishwasher packs. I had a friend try them out in their dishwasher with the same result. Very frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These detergent pods clean incredibly well, however make sure ...
customer_reviews.text: These detergent pods clean incredibly well, however make sure you don't wash silicone items with it, as the scent could embed itself into it. Maybe baking soda or vinegar could get rid of the scent. Plastics are safe for me, however maybe it varies by dishwasher. EDIT: So after a few non detergent washes and soaks of the impacted silicone item, the scent is almost all but gone. So it's not the end of the world if you do use silicone, just soak it in normal soapy water and air it out, and it will dissipate eventually, but it's probably still wise to avoid washing silicone items with this particular detergent, non scented ones would be the preferred ones.
customer_reviews.author: Beloved

customer_reviews.title: The cleaning power of this Cascade is excellent. But the odor is unbearable
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning power of this Cascade is excellent. But the odor is unbearable!! Let my dishes wash while I was gone. Returned home to a horrible chemical odor. Almost gave me an asthma attack. It smelled strong when I opened the box, but I thought after running through the dish washer it wouldn't be bad....WRONG! Wish I could find some that cleans this well, that doesn't kill me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy buying in quantity however is there a draw back
customer_reviews.text: the last couple of times have ordered these the pods are hard and do not dissolve completely in my dishwasher and I have clumps on the dishes near my dispenser. the first time I thought I had left the top off and the pods had dried out but however when I got this shipment they are hard I squeeze the pod to make it soft but I still have small white specks on my dishes do you have a solution to my problem please email me
customer_reviews.author: buddybear

customer_reviews.title: Best Dishwasher Detergent I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: This is for "Cascade Platinum Dishwasher Pods, Actionpacs Dishwasher Detergent, Fresh Scent, 62 Count". I've ran the gamut of most dishwasher detergents from cheap generics to pricey brands (surprisingly some of the generics wind up cleaning better). This stuff is the only detergent I've found that consistently performs well. One pod of this plus a little Finish Hard Water Booster Powder in the pre-wash and all the dishes come out great most every time. Run some Finish Dual Action Dishwasher Cleaner through the dishwasher once every few months and let the Cascade Platinum take care of the maintenance cleaning. Best setup I've found, ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, various dishwasher liquids have done a less than satisfactory job. We've tried all kinds. Regular, bio-degradable, expensive, economical, you name it. Then, while checking reviews on Amazon, ran across rave reviews of Cascade Platinum. Tried it. Wow! It actually worked. Hopefully, the dishwasher thoroughly cleans the chemicals that are in the tablet and the chemicals are not harmful to the environment. But, we have clean plates...and bowls...and cups...and pans...and pots...and cutlery...and... It's not as magical as one might hope. Items that have really dried and caked on stuff on them will still have stuff remaining after the wash. So, those kinds of items still need some hand cleaning but overall it's a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Tushar Mehta

customer_reviews.title: Smell very strong | lots of chemicals covered by some ...
customer_reviews.text: Smell very strong | lots of chemicals covered by some lemon. Scary smell in your plates. Will never buy again!
customer_reviews.author: luchia

customer_reviews.title: It's too much, poorly balanced.
customer_reviews.text: There is a thick smell of the detergent on all the "clean" dishes. Too much. The worst is when I plate my food and eat my food and taste the strong taste of detergent. Disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Fang Chen

customer_reviews.title: An improvement but depends on appliance
customer_reviews.text: With all the hype about this getting better results than others I tried it. It seems to still leave spots on plastics and some glassware. Not sure if it's the dishwasher or the product. (I just moved and the apartment's DW isn't a high end brand so this could explain the results. It's hard to tell.) I'd say it's better than some of the powders I've been using. The convenience is a plus, but I found the container hard to open. I've and been using these by pulling back the lid and grabbing one because I can't get the actual lid to open. Probably made this way to childproof it, but it's keeping adults off limits also.
customer_reviews.author: cybernurse

customer_reviews.title: There's NO Dishwashing Product Like This -- Dishes Are Clean and Glass is Like Brand-new
customer_reviews.text: I'm a skeptic from the Show-Me State (Missouri), and Cascade Platinum has won me over....if it's not Cascade Platinum pods, I'd rather do the dishes by hand. Don't miss this amazing product -- just be sure to RINSE dishes before loading as you should do for any and all dishwashing products (there's no little man who lives inside your machine who will get rid of all of the excess garbage for you) - BUT even if you rinse, no other product can come close to the delivery that you'll get with Cascade Platinum -- cleaning, rinsing, and crystal clear. I'm SOLD -- KP Harwell, Phoenix, AZ
customer_reviews.author: KP Harwell

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I can really tell the difference between this, the regular cascade, and even the competitive brands. I order mines through the subscribe and save, for the lower price. I tried to switch and my dishes had to either be rewashed again, of hand washed for better result
customer_reviews.author: Dasexistylist

customer_reviews.title: Health hazzard! Terrible chemical smell and after taste!
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly purchased this version of Cascade rather than my usual Clean fresh scent packs. All my dishes have a strong chemical smell and I have to rinse all my dishes again to remove the aftertaste this product leaves on all the dishes! Cleanliness is not worth a risk to your health! Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Helga Huber

customer_reviews.title: Clean dishes
customer_reviews.text: Love these, and yes they do clean better than the last Generation (x10). They are getting a bit pricey tho.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.M

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My dishwasher was looking cloudy and so where my dishes. I thought my 20 year old dishwasher needed to be replaced, then I emailed KitchenAid and they suggested a dishwasher cleaner, which cleaned up the problem with the dishwasher, but the dishes where still cloudy. I was at the dollar store and bought a small package of Cascade Platinum just to try it out. What a difference my dishes and silverware looked brand new . I have always used Cascade powder but this stuff has more cleaning power. Even my plastic glasses are clear again. Love this Cascade.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Too harsh and and scent lingers on dishes
customer_reviews.text: I will give the cleaning power of this dish washing detergent a 5. However, it is so powerful that anything with writing on it will eventually disappear. I have had the pictured measuring cup for years and sadly I will have to purchase another one as I can no longer read it. Also, the scent stays on the dishes well after they have been put away. Storage containers, even glass, transfers the smell to the food within. As much as I love opening the dishwasher to a clean interior and dishes I will have to find a new product.
customer_reviews.author: John Chasse

customer_reviews.title: This... is... the... BOMB!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the dishwasher detergent we have tried, this is absolutely, positively, unquestionably the best EVER. Every other brand we used performed poorly, leaving residue on plastic containers, glass, and stainless steel. Even after 2 or 3 rinses, there would be food particles settled on the bottom of upside-down glasses and mugs, etc. But after just one cycle using this, and no extra rinses, everything is sparkling clean and NO FOOD PARTICLES! In short, this... is... the... BOMB!
customer_reviews.author: Egon, in Ittoqqortoormiit, Greenland

customer_reviews.title: Too many stuck together
customer_reviews.text: The last few times I ordered from amazon, the ponds were stuck together. Usually just a few, but this past purchase was a waste. I live in Vegas with zero humidity so that can’t be blamed. Somewhere in the distribution, moisture is getting in. If they weren’t so pricey, it wouldn’t concern me.
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: The tub pops back into shape easily. Oh they clean dishes too
customer_reviews.text: The packets are very strong, they won't leak when amazon throws them in a box with your speakers without protection. The tub pops back into shape easily. Oh they clean dishes too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not efficient
customer_reviews.text: I got these instead of our usual brand and wont be purchasing again. My dishes have been stinky and not cleaning well! (It's NOT my filter or my brand new Bosch dishwasher either). This hasn't happened with my other brand! The scent is unbearable under my cabinet because the container doesn't stay closed. Incredible chemixal smell I've never noticed before. May be the shipper here too idk if it's a true product or knock off
customer_reviews.author: Kasey D

customer_reviews.title: Best Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I typically believe that you don't need to spend a lot of money or get brand-name items to have decent quality. In the case of dishwasher detergent, name and money do tend to mean better quality. I've tried all kinds of hard tablets and gel pouches. These Cascade combo pacs (powder and gel), work the best compared to everything I've tried. I try to get the cost savings in quantity and buy the big bucket. If I only have to buy one of these buckets a few times a year - great. And I love not having to go to the store to get them.
customer_reviews.author: THP

customer_reviews.title: Planned to throw away the dishes before these.  Now they look new!
customer_reviews.text: We were actually going to throw out all of our glasses and buy new. Had a sample 2 pack for this product that came in with our new dishwasher. Had used the dishwasher already for 2 months with a rinse agent and the glasses did not look any better. Found the sample in the drawer when we ran out of soap. Used one and could not believe our eyes the next day when we opened the dishwasher. Our cloudy filmy "let's throw them out" glass dishes were all sparkling clean and shiny. We are rarely amazed by products and rarely pay for name brands, but these are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: ericangie95

customer_reviews.title: Etches glassware
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Finish dishwasher tablets for a couple of years and never had a problem. I decided to switch to this Cascade product because of all the positive reviews and a review in Consumer Reports. I will NOT be buying any more. My glassware is now taking on a frosted or etched appearance that never happened with Finish. Other than that it seems to work OK but I am very disappointed with what it's doing to my glassware.
customer_reviews.author: W. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Absolute life saver - works well with both short and normal cycles.
customer_reviews.text: *disclaimer* - Only 5 star review if you can get the 62 count under $11.50, otherwise I would give it a 4 star. My experience comes from using a Whirlpool WDF770SAFZ dishwasher. I came from using the Finish Quantum, which at the time I loved. Since using this you can definitely see a difference, especially in the quick wash cycles. Even though it doesn't advertise it, it dries much better. I've used the same rinse aid for both the Quantum and Platinum. This is a no brainer for me because it is cheaper and performs better in my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Streak Free & CLEAN! (Amazing!!)
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant purchasing this dishwasher detergent. I had always been able to use cheap detergent until I moved and no longer had city water. I took the risk with this Cascade Dishwasher Detergent, and it was well worth the risk! Combined with a rinse aid (purchased separately), this detergent not only leaves my dishes clean, but streak free! Using the rinse aid with the old detergent didn't help one bit. I finally feel great knowing my dishes are clean and streak free after a dishwasher run. I also like that it doesn't have a strong smell to it. Just clean! It's worth the extra cost! You will not be disappointed, I sure wasn't!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant scent, convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like the box these come in. It is super nice to place under the sink to easily grab a pod when I am ready to run the dishwasher. I don't think they really have a strong scent. A mild scent to me is pleasant. However, I think the cost of these is still a big expensive. Overall, 3 stars because of price. Cascade truly does clean the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These dishwasher tabs work great. They cleaned all my glasses, dishes, and silverware perfectly. These tabs also removed some old stains on some of the pots and pans I put in the dishwasher. These cost more but definitely clean hard messes better than the regular tabs. For light messes you can get the same results from the lower level tabs, but the platinum tabs are best for bigger messes.
customer_reviews.author: KM152

customer_reviews.title: Really cleans those dishes
customer_reviews.text: When compared with other dish washing products, Cascade platinum has proven to clean the majority of dishes very well. There are occasions when a dish of two is not cleaned completely probably because the food has remained on the surface in the dishwasher for a day or two. Satisfied with the product which is more costlier than store brands, but you don't end up redoing the dishes again.
customer_reviews.author: Sachse TX

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding results
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the screw cap to my port for rinse solution was lost and my dishes always had residue on them. I used the first pack last night and when I opened the dishwasher to take out my teacups the first thing I noticed was that there was no residual tea stain. Then I checked the spoons, which always have residual stain (yes, I drink tea like other people drink coffee - lots of it), and they looked brand new. I'm seriously impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Kelly

customer_reviews.title: As my husband says... It's platinum or nothing!
customer_reviews.text: My husband refuses to buy anything but the platinum ones. He promised me I didn't have to rinse the dishes before putting them in the dishwasher. I didn't believe him, so he said if they didn't come out clean he would re-wash them by hand himself. He was right! Definitely makes doing the dishes a lot easier... Worth the extra money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Toodles

customer_reviews.title: Great product to get your dishes clean!
customer_reviews.text: What I like about the product is the way it cleans my dishes. I have an old dishwasher. When I put my dirty dishes directly into the dishwasher without rinsing, they nearly always come out sparkling clean. Rarely, is there any residual food left on any of the dishes. I have used this product daily for a few years now and am very happy with the job it does on my dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I cant believe what a difference this makes
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying the cheaper pods for a long time.. but the wife would always complain they did not do a good job. We saw the ad for these and said... lets try it. WOW! What a difference. The dishes come out cleaner and dryer. We were amazed. We now are convinced that this is all we use now!
customer_reviews.author: David McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Realkly cleans! No residual power on dishes! Not messy! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the same type of Cascade dishwasher detergent for years. I was increasingly unhappy with it. Dishes did not get clean although I pre-rinsed them. Specks of detergent powder were scattered on my clean dishes so I had to wipe or rinse them off. I tried Cascade platinum and it is great! Cleans my dishes perfectly! No residual powder. Not messy like my old powder detergent. Easy to put the packet right in the dispenser box. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: lovedogs

customer_reviews.title: ruins any thing aluminum
customer_reviews.text: These pods clean great, not as messy as powder - but, heads-up they ruin anything aluminum. It also leaves a bit of cleaner - I rinse glasses and pans before I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Lmason

customer_reviews.title: With this stuff and a good dishwasher, you'll never have to pre-wash your dishes again!
customer_reviews.text: We got a new dishwasher a couple of years back that recommended this detergent, and came with a sample, and that's how we discovered the miracle of a dishwasher that actually WASHES the DISHES. But then we wanted to save some dough and bought an off-brand. SO NOT WORTH IT. While the new dishwasher cleans WAY better than our old one even with cheaper soap or pods, it does a WAY better job with this stuff. I know I'm getting really spoiled because I hardly ever even pre-rinse anymore, even with crusty dishes, and I NEVER pre-wash.
customer_reviews.author: Mouriana

customer_reviews.title: One Stop Solution for Clean Glasses / Dishes!
customer_reviews.text: We have had issues with white cloudy glasses since they removed phosphate from dishwasher liquid and have tried a variety of solutions, including using Lemi-shine along with our normal load. We'd put the dishwasher liquid, and the crystals in the machine and the results were pretty good. Along came Cascade Platinum, and we no longer have to use two products and the results exceed anything we've tried in the past! We now have clean looking dishes again!
customer_reviews.author: Stinger72

customer_reviews.title: Way cheaper than the grocery store
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to buy this package on Amazon because you save a good few bucks over the grocery store. These pods will make your dishwasher do its best work. The need for pre-rinse is much less, and you will not need to use another product like Jet Dry in the dish washer either because its built into the pod.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: The amount of actionpacs in this is a great deal and I purchase these for my practical gift ...
customer_reviews.text: The dishes come out clean every time with this dish detergent. It is the only brand I will use. I have tried others in the past that either made my glasses cloudy, or I had to put a ton in for it to work. I can pop one of these in the dishwasher and walk away knowing my dishes will come out clean. The amount of actionpacs in this is a great deal and I purchase these for my practical gift loving family members every year for Christmas. When doing a very heavy load of dishes, I will use two instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: HobbsGal

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the dishes appeared to not be clean. I have softened water and rinse off dishes prior to loading. I read reviews thinking this product would clean the dishes to the standard of cleanliness I would expect. The silverware is where I noticed it the most and glassware. All had streaks. Very unhappy with this and went back to using the Dropps. That is a great product plus it is eco friendly and very cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Stray Cat Rescue Associates MN

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner I've seen, but beware
customer_reviews.text: This cleans everything! No mater how nasty, burned on, or stained, this cleans it all off in a single wash. The caveat here it that it's also strong enough to remove more than just food. Copper cladding... GONE! Sealant on solid metal knife handles... GONE!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Does an impressive job at cleaning dishes
customer_reviews.text: I use the Cascade Platinum packs along with Cascade rinse aid in our modern Kenmore dishwasher. My wife bought some organic dish detergent stuff once and it didn't do nearly as good of a job. Our dishwasher came with a sample of these, if you're not very happy with how your dishwasher is doing, first see if the filter needs to be cleaned, then give these a try. You probably won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Partington

customer_reviews.title: Even cleans chunky, curdled toddler milk found in day old bottles!! YUM!!
customer_reviews.text: Part of my subscribe and save shipment. These are by far the best dishwasher tablets. We have a Samsung dishwasher which I was not crazy about, until I started spending the extras $$$ for these. These work great and seem to be the only ones that get all the gunk out. I am typically washing dishes, cups and lots of toddler milk bottles, some of which have been found under my seat in the car, festering with milk.... ew. I used to through them out but with these, they come out clean and smelling new.
customer_reviews.author: mookerblu

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: I had always used cheaper liquid dw detergent. Noticed that nothing really worked well anymore. Decided to try this and what a difference. Our dishwasher is 24 yo and is white inside which was now yellowish and discolored. I tried to hand clean the inside but nothing really helped. With this detergent not only are the dishes cleaner than ever, the dishwasher looks new inside and is bright white again. It may be pricey but I'm a believer.
customer_reviews.author: LCB

customer_reviews.title: A Game-changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dishwasher detergent I have ever used. Doing the dishes is my least favorite chore, but these do the job so well, it's a such a pleasant surprise to see what they can clean! If you are busy or just want to be wowed at what they can invent these days, I highly recommend it. The sparkling silverware was a pleasant surprise as well as the shiny pots and pans and ability to clean burnt on things. Amazon is the best place, especially cheaper compared to the grocery store! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Stay away...use another brand
customer_reviews.text: Poor washing results and a very strong odor coating all the dishes. Switched to Finish power ball and I'm seeing far superior washing results with very little odor in the same 3 month old dishwasher..
customer_reviews.author: Dillan’s Dad

customer_reviews.title: Bad shape for older dispensers
customer_reviews.text: These do a good job of cleaning the dishes but we bought our washer long before detergent pods and the dispenser must be persuaded to accommodate their thickness. They must be placed in the compartment just so and the lid must be forced to latch. There is plenty of room in the dispenser for the pods to be wider and longer but they are all but too deep. One of the reasons I use pods is for the convenience which is greatly diminished when you regularly must reopen the door and fish the often not wet pod out of the bottom of the washer because the dispenser door popped open.
customer_reviews.author: Denni

customer_reviews.title: PSA: Stop RINSING dishes before putting them in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: Rinsing is a waste of water and energy. If your going to rinse/preclean then you might as well just hand wash. Why wash dishes before you wash dishes? Scrap the chunks and let this awesome product and the dishwasher do the work. My dishes come out pristine with just one packet. If it doesn't work for you perhaps your dishwasher is subpar. Just my 2 cents from an average American who is very aware of how wasteful we are with our natural resources. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MizzToYou

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with packaging and shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but the shipping box was totally damaged which caused the actually tub to be destroyed on the bottom. Luckily, I have another tub, but this is unusable and unacceptable. It’s an accident, I get it, but should have been shipped with more care.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: These pods are definitely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area where I have massive hard water. A filter helps some. These pods are the only dishwashing detergent that I have found that has eliminated most of the hard water stains on my dishes. I have tried many other leading brands and nothing has come close to the results I get from cascade. I have no complaints the scent is great. The dishes can go right into the cabinet because they are super clean and all my glasses come out spot free. I do feel it’s a bit on the pricey side, but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not in my House
customer_reviews.text: Not supporting Old Spice and the myriad of Proctor & Gamble brands anymore thanks to Gillette’s anti-male propaganda.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Guse

customer_reviews.title: The only dishwasher soap we use
customer_reviews.text: I hate washing dishes. With a passion. My favorite appliance in my house will always be my dishwasher. I also refuse to rinse my dishes before putting them in the dishwasher (of course I scrape off any food pieces). These dish tabs are definitely the best dishwasher soap we have found. We still occasionally get a dish that has to go through a cycle again, but that is usually more to do with how the dishwasher was loaded. This soap makes our dishes sparkle!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Platinum is better
customer_reviews.text: I really do notice a difference between platinum and other Cascades. It really does work better. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my dishes spotless... And I'm lazy I rarely pre rinse... And usually I don't run the dishwasher daily.... If stuff is super dirty I use one in the normal compartment and just through another one anywhere in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champion!
customer_reviews.text: No worries about baked on food or cloudy glasses or spotty silverware with this stuff. It works! By the way... I read somewhere years ago that the biggest mistake people make with their dishwasher is using too much soap. I admit that I was one of them. More soap means cleaner dishes, right? Nope. It means etched glasses, dishes, and pans over time. The "pods" concept has solved that problem for me. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher tabs
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for years now, via subscribe and save, and I have had no issues with quality vs. buying at a store. These tabs do their job and in my opinion work better than some cheaper tabs I've tried. Always have a box under the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Rich C

customer_reviews.title: Clears up the fish and egg smell that dishwashers get
customer_reviews.text: My dishwasher kept smelling like fish and eggs, leaving everything to smell like that too. It was plaguing my household. I randomly purchased this product not thinking it would help the situation. Everything smells great now. I'd give this product over 5 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Matcha_

customer_reviews.title: It cleans beautifully the moment I learned that you're supposed to toss them into the bottom of the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I use two per-wash because I am wasteful. Sometimes three, which I don't understand why. It cleans beautifully the moment I learned that you're supposed to toss them into the bottom of the dishwasher and not try to jam them where the fluid goes (pro tip!).
customer_reviews.author: Chris Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Won't dissolve completely
customer_reviews.text: Pod will not dissolve completely. Very disappointed. Haven't had this problem with previous pods... different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Martha R. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great with subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: Great with Subscribe and Save! We do not use these as much as the recommended use rate so I have to push back deliveries pretty often. We also wait till the dishwasher is unreasonably full to run a cycle so that could be why we don’t go through them as quickly. Regardless everything gets clean even when it is jam packed every single time :)
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L

customer_reviews.title: Leaves film
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned products very well, but left a film on everything... I am a nursing mother and it leaves a film on all breastpump parts that stays on my hands and gets all over everything I touch throughout the day (cell phone, desk, keyboard, etc). If it leaves this film, who knows what its passing along to my baby... ordered the Puracy and looking forward to trying those.
customer_reviews.author: Bodie S.

customer_reviews.title: Many broken upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered these from subscribe and save for years. However- recently we have found that a large number of the kids a broken when they arrive. The liquid then dissolved other pods and you end up with clumps if unusable pods. Not it’s is is worth it if so many are not usable. We are considering cancelling our monthly delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Limitations
customer_reviews.text: Like ALL Dishwasher Detergents, this version will NOT deal with Avocado (fresh or dried). Also failed to meet the "Cleans Baked-on Food", or "Tough on Burnt-on Messes" ( 'Tough-on' dose NOT mean 'CLEANS'!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling Clean!
customer_reviews.text: Cascade rules. Was using another name brand dishwasher detergent before I tried Cascade. I'm staying with Cascade-what a difference! Everything comes out sparkling clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie W.

customer_reviews.title: The scent is too strong for a dishwashing soap
customer_reviews.text: The detergent cleans well but the chemical scent makes me nauseous and gives me a headache. This product doesn't seem appropriate for a dishwashing soap I cannot recommend it, it's best to stick with the free and clear
customer_reviews.author: Tatia

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a difference.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I can not believe what a difference these make. We had been using the other brands power ball. Dishes came out ok. We decided to try these and wow, wow, wow. No more spots on glassware and silverware. Everything comes out clean, shiny, and smells nice. Even the stainless steel tub of the dishwasher looks like new. well worth the little bit of a price difference.
customer_reviews.author: dave aberle

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: The only dishwasher pods we use!! My dishwasher is older and doesn't work the best... was going to upgrade until I tried these. Made a huge difference. Now I can get a few more years out of my dishwasher! Lol! Amazon has the best price on these!! I always have a few extra tubs under the sink cause I won't pay what they are asking at the local Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Colton J. Archer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to clean well
customer_reviews.text: I started buying these as they were strongly recommended so use with my new dishwasher. They seem to do the job and the smell is pleasant and clean. These can sometimes be hard to find so it was nice to be able to set these up as a subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Traci C

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time EVER my dishes come clean without having to wash them before putting into the dishwasher. I ran out of my usual brand and borrow a few pods from my daughter; I immediately ordered Cascade Platinum for myself. Thank you Cascade for saving water and my time.
customer_reviews.author: LyndyMD

customer_reviews.title: Makes my job easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this dish washer product. The scent it leaves is mild, the dishes, pots, pans, cups and glasses, and silverware get clean and I am more confident that they ARE clean
customer_reviews.author: Nancy from GA

customer_reviews.title: Very Clean Dishes
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the scent but not really a fan of any. I rinse thoroughly before putting into the dishwasher but there is absolutely no residue like we had with others.
customer_reviews.author: Hakunamatata49

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling clean dishes.
customer_reviews.text: I got a smoking deal on these- way cheaper than the grocery store. I like the pods cause they are nice and clean. I have no clue how they work but my dishes seem to come out sparkling.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rae

customer_reviews.title: Works well with bad city water
customer_reviews.text: These are the only pods my dishwasher will tolerate because of our city waster. We added a generic drying agent and viola! These are the best we’ve ever tried, much better than the regular Cascade.
customer_reviews.author: FunnyMama

customer_reviews.title: Been buying for a few years
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these on a regular basis...they work well. Amazon sells them at a better value than my local stores so this is a no brainer. My dishes are clean and these are so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: George T.

customer_reviews.title: HOLY CRAP THEY WORKED
customer_reviews.text: Cant Complain! Dishes came out clean. I made lasagna and did not prewash the pan. Figured Id test it out. HOLY CRAP. The pan was spotless. Love these!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: #1 Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best dishwasher packs for your money
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dishwasher packs for your money. This Amazon price is very good. When Cascade came out with complete, it changed the way dishes came clean. It seem to just completely destroy any locked on food. Platinum is even better! It's all I buy now. I've gone through a lot of different brands and different levels and this is the best one. I'm done shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Gosse

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. No need to measure detergent. These cheap to perfection without residue or etching glassware even on the energy saver setting of my dishwasher. Even my husband can use the dishwasher using these action packs 😅. I’ll never go back to powder or liquid detergent. Thanks to whoever invented these!
customer_reviews.author: CabushkaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to a good product
customer_reviews.text: I tried this detergent today and do not understand where all these ”wow”s came from? It does not do its job well despite being loaded with chemicals of different kind🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Zaitata

customer_reviews.title: Does An Excellent Job Of Cleaning And Is Very Economical.
customer_reviews.text: These clean dishes very well, remove small amounts of food left on dishes, and rinse clean. For the price, they're very economical too so unless you have to wash a lot of dishes often, one container should last you quite a long time. I've been very pleased with my purchase and will definitely buy these again. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwashing tabs!
customer_reviews.text: These dishwasher tabs are so great! They give a perfect spotless shiny to all of my dishes. They are the only dishwasher tabs I use. I recommend them to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Heather

customer_reviews.title: Wasnt able to use many.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed this time around when I ordered cascade platinum dishwasher pods. They all came popped. I was only able to use 5 of them. I went to the store and had to buy more. I thought I would try ordering since I run an in home daycare and sometimes dont make it to the store for a weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. I'm glad I went with a bulkier size to get more bang for the buck. Prior to using this, I was worried about my dishwasher. After using these, everything comes out crystal clean.
customer_reviews.author: David Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Cleans dishes and dishwasher very well
customer_reviews.text: Great product - seems to keep my dishes clean as well as the dishwasher. I'm not one to pre-wash stuff but these tablets still get everything off!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this at the grocer. Switched to Amazon. Been using this Cascade choice along with Lemishine Booster for awhile. Between the two, no spots on what clear glass I put in the washer. (mostly jars) - (We Don't put drinking glasses in DW as we use YETI for everyday drinkware) So, I can't really comment on drinking glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Caterwaul

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with hard water stains all over my glass dishes. This product is doing magic tricks. All dishes are super clean, all old stains are gone. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Natty

customer_reviews.title: Clean dishes!
customer_reviews.text: I switched from a more environmentally friendly brand to these because you just can’t beat the clean. Handles all kinds of crud left on dishes and everything is spotless when it comes out. It even got all the crusty water build up off the dishes after using other brands for a while. Good stuff in these little pods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't make the switch again
customer_reviews.text: We had gotten a water softener this year and they gave us a bunch of new soaps to use with it. Included in that was some dishwasher detergent. We tried it for a while and noticed our dishes not getting as clean as they were. Needless to say, we are not switching again, this stuff works; others do not.
customer_reviews.author: BassTrombone1979

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: Gets glassware spotless and cleans heavy grime and grease off of pans without rinsing and without redeposit. Buy yourself a Bosch (most reliable per Consumer Reports) and use these tabs. The Finish quantum max are very close in performance but Cascade gets the nod due to less(read none) redeposit from very dirty pans on to glassware in my Bosch Ascenta 46db.
customer_reviews.author: testicular

customer_reviews.title: Really cleans
customer_reviews.text: I saw a commercial on tv with a little girl confused why her mom was washing dishes before putting them in the dishwasher- advertising it’s ability to remove left on food for a clean finish- I was out anyway so thought I would give it a shot: totally worked
customer_reviews.author: Dei K

customer_reviews.title: These Cascade platinum pacs are phenomenal!!
customer_reviews.text: Wound up trying Finish pacs for some reason which left some dishes and silverware unclean, spots, rust marks. Will never buy anything but Cascade again! Had used the Cascade liquid for many years which works great too but like the tidiness of these and it comes with rinse agent and Dawn! These Cascade platinum pacs are phenomenal!!
customer_reviews.author: LadyPzaz

customer_reviews.title: Best dishwasher soap!
customer_reviews.text: I used to rinse and try to get all food off before putting dishes into the dishwasher. With Platinum, no need. Dishes come out sparkling every time!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used pods before in my dishwasher so this was new to me. I decided to try them because they were rated very high for a dishwasher detergent. I love these. They leave no spots, eveything comes out so clean. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: mg0569

customer_reviews.title: Work great compared to the competition
customer_reviews.text: I have used several other brands and we like these the best. I only use "name" brands so am comparing apples to apples. I would imagine the dishwasher configuration could affect which ones work better, so with that in mind, These work great with Fridgedaire Dishwashers.
customer_reviews.author: JayZ

customer_reviews.title: Need to return - have enough-
customer_reviews.text: I continue to receive these when I’ve cancelled. I don’t need it! Please let me know how I can return this. Good product I just don’t need 3 of these. It will take forever to use and they are taking up space. Please reply with return instructions.
customer_reviews.author: GoShopping

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, but leaves an aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well, very convenient, a little pricey. But my real concern is that it leaves an ‘aftertaste’ that requires me to hand rinse afterwards. Aftertaste most noticeable in glasses when drinking something. Will be looking for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Raptor

customer_reviews.title: Finally a tab that works
customer_reviews.text: Just want to say I went through a year with another top competitor just trying to use up the bulk I purchased here even though their product was now junk and didn't work. Hard to throw away 50 tabs. Anyways, Thank you cascade for working. no problems at all since I changed over and my glasses are looking crystal clear and even shiny again.
customer_reviews.author: H. L. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, best dishwasher detergent
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of no pre-rinsing or soaking. (It’s bad for the environment). I just scrape dishes and throw (neatly place) them in the dishwasher. They always come out sparkling clean, no matter what I put in there. Every other brand is a disappointment compared to this detergent. The Kitchenaid dishwasher probably deserves some of the credit. :)
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Best for the job.
customer_reviews.text: Best for the job of washing dishes but needs a little help from a rinse aid tto avoid spotting hough better than other detergents.
customer_reviews.author: BE

product_meta.title: Cascade Platinum Dishwasher Pods, Actionpacs Dishwasher Detergent, Fresh Scent, 62 Count
product_meta.description: Cascade Complete ActionPacs dishwasher detergent powers away even 24-hour stuck-on messes for a complete clean. That’s because every ActionPac is formulated with the grease-fighting power of Dawn.
feature_bullets: No pre-wash needed—Cascade Platinum dishwasher detergent removes burnt-on food
Our powerful ActionPac unleashes cleaning agents that dissolve food, lift it off, and rinse it away
Cascade Platinum ActionPacs clean 24-hour stuck-on food so well you can skip the pre-wash. This can save up to 15 gallons of water per dishwasher load!
Dissolves quickly to unleash cleaning power early in the cycle; Ingredients: Contains sodium carbonate, nonionic surfactants, sodium silicate and enzymes. Phosphate free.
Cascade's best dishwashing detergent to keep your silverware and dishwasher sparkling

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
